definition: decoration/ornament/to decorate/to adorn/to hide/to conceal (a fault)/excuse (to hide a fault)/to play a role (in opera)/to impersonate
to develop/to evolve/to practice/to perform/to play/to act

sentences.english: He was to play the professor, reprising the role he'd done years ago.
sentences.chinese: 他饰演教授一角，重新演出两年前演过的角色。

sentences.english: As Joey Tribbiani, Matt LeBlanc played the loveable male lunkhead of the group.
sentences.chinese: 马特饰演的乔伊是这个小团体中呆头呆脑的开心果。

sentences.english: Because she played a feminine image of weakness.
sentences.chinese: 因为她饰演了一个无力抗争的女性形象。

sentences.english: Hao Bin as Eros, meanwhile, left everybody astonished.
sentences.chinese: 而郝斌饰演的爱神给人留下了震撼的映像。

sentences.english: Andy Lau plays the Zhou Zhihao, is H, a city police.
sentences.chinese: 刘德华饰演的周志豪，是H城的一名警察。

sentences.english: Have you seen mrs betterton playing gracia na?
sentences.chinese: 你见过伯特顿夫人饰演格雷西亚吗？

sentences.english: So bad feeling to Jangmengjie who played Lindaiyu.
sentences.chinese: 对林黛玉的饰演者蒋梦捷感觉不好啊。

sentences.english: He hires another actor to play his twin brother.
sentences.chinese: 于是他雇佣另一个演员饰演他的双胞胎兄弟。

sentences.english: However, Gerard Butler may disappoint many audiences as the Phantom.
sentences.chinese: 然而，谢拉毕拿饰演的魅影或许令不少观众失望。

sentences.english: It is performed by Zhang Yechuan, who has won the highest award of drama in China "Meihua(plum flower) Award".
sentences.chinese: 饰演南越王赵佗的则是张页川是中国戏剧梅花奖得主。

sentences.english: In the film, the Zhu Qingsheng of Zheng Hao personate is an average miner.
sentences.chinese: 电影中，郑昊饰演的朱庆生是一位普通的矿工。

sentences.english: It is interesting that the three women have played starring Zheng Xiaoning's wife.
sentences.chinese: 有意思的是，这三位女主演都曾饰演郑晓宁的妻子。

sentences.english: Ning Chang acted as a orphan from orphanage.
sentences.chinese: 张钧宁在片中饰演来自孤儿院的孤儿。

sentences.english: She plays Elisabeth, the daughter of a rich man.
sentences.chinese: 她饰演依莉莎白的女儿，一个富有的人。

sentences.english: She chose two untried actors for the leading roles.
sentences.chinese: 她选了两个没有经验的演员饰演主角。

sentences.english: That's certainly the case with young Dakota Goyo, who plays Max.
sentences.chinese: 这当然与年轻的达科他州Goyo，饰演最大的案件。

definition: to appear (in a show etc)/an appearance (on stage etc)
to act the leading role (in a movie or a play)/to star/lead actor
to play the role of/to act
(of an actor) to bring (one's character) to life/to act brilliantly
to develop/to evolve/to practice/to perform/to play/to act
decoration/ornament/to decorate/to adorn/to hide/to conceal (a fault)/excuse (to hide a fault)/to play a role (in opera)/to impersonate
role/character in a novel/persona/also pr. [jiao3 se4]
photo taken during a theatrical production/a still (from a movie)
scene (in a movie etc)/one's part in a movie or play/(archaic) actor's payment
